having_IPhaving_IP_Address.description: Whether the URL has an IP address

value_dict.0: The URL does not have an IP address
value_dict.1: The URL has an IP address

Shortining_Service.description: Whether the URL uses a URL shortening service

value_dict.1: The URL uses a URL shortening service
value_dict.0: The URL does not use a URL shortening service

value_dict.1: The URL contains "@" symbol
value_dict.0: The URL does not contain "@" symbol

double_slash_redirecting.description: Whether the URL has "//" in the path part or not

value_dict.0: The URL does not have "//" in the path part
value_dict.1: The URL has "//" in the path part

Prefix_Suffix.description: Whether the domain has a "-" symbol

value_dict.0: The domain does not have a "-" symbol
value_dict.1: The domain has a "-" symbol

having_Sub_Domain.description: Number of sub domains in the URL

SSLfinal_State.description: State of the SSL certificate of the website

value_dict.0: The SSL certificate of the website is not trusted
value_dict.1: The SSL certificate of the website is trusted
value_dict.-1: The website does not have a SSL certificate

Domain_registeration_length.description: Length of time since the domain was registered

Favicon.description: Whether the website has a favicon or not

value_dict.1: The website has a favicon
value_dict.0: The website does not have a favicon

port.description: Whether the website uses a standard HTTP port

value_dict.1: The website uses a standard HTTP port
value_dict.0: The website does not use a standard HTTP port

HTTPS_token.description: Whether the domain part includes HTTPS token

value_dict.0: The domain part does not include HTTPS token
value_dict.1: The domain part includes HTTPS token

Request_URL.description: Whether the URL in tags is loaded from the same domain

value_dict.1: The URL in tags is loaded from the same domain
value_dict.0: The URL in tags is not loaded from the same domain

URL_of_Anchor.description: Percentage of URLs in anchor tags that point to the same domain

Links_in_tags.description: Percentage of links in <Meta>, <Script> and <Link> tags pointing to the same domain

SFH.description: Whether the "about:blank" is used as an action field in the form

value_dict.0: "about:blank" is not used as an action field in the form
value_dict.1: "about:blank" is used as an action field in the form
value_dict.-1: The form does not have an action field

Submitting_to_email.description: Whether the website has a "mailto:" used in the form

value_dict.0: The website does not have a "mailto:" used in the form
value_dict.1: The website has a "mailto:" used in the form

Abnormal_URL.description: Whether the host name is different from the domain name in the URL

value_dict.0: The host name is the same as the domain name in the URL
value_dict.1: The host name is different from the domain name in the URL

Redirect.description: Number of redirects in the website

on_mouseover.description: Whether the website has "onmouseover" to change the status bar

value_dict.1: The website has "onmouseover" to change the status bar
value_dict.0: The website does not have "onmouseover" to change the status bar

RightClick.description: Whether the right click is disabled on the website

value_dict.1: The right click is disabled on the website
value_dict.0: The right click is not disabled on the website

popUpWidnow.description: Whether the website has a popup window

value_dict.1: The website has a popup window
value_dict.0: The website does not have a popup window

value_dict.1: The website has an "iframe"
value_dict.0: The website does not have an "iframe"

DNSRecord.description: Whether the website has DNS records

value_dict.0: The website does not have DNS records
value_dict.1: The website has DNS records

web_traffic.description: Web traffic rank of the website

Google_Index.description: Whether the website is indexed by Google

value_dict.1: The website is indexed by Google
value_dict.0: The website is not indexed by Google

Links_pointing_to_page.description: Number of links pointing to the page

Statistical_report.description: Whether the website redirects the user to a different domain

value_dict.0: The website does not redirect the user to a different domain
value_dict.1: The website redirects the user to a different domain

Result.description: Whether the website is phishing(1) or not(0)

value_dict.0: The website is not phishing
value_dict.1: The website is phishing

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in website security.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the website, please predict if the website is phishing or not.
prompt.answer_prompt: The website is not phishing[0] or The website is phishing[1]?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in SSL certificate validation.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the website, please predict the state of the SSL certificate.
prompt.answer_prompt: Not trusted[0], trusted[1] or does not have a SSL certificate[2]?

class_value_dict.0: The SSL certificate of the website is not trusted
class_value_dict.1: The SSL certificate of the website is trusted
class_value_dict.-1: The website does not have a SSL certificate

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in web analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the website, please predict the web traffic.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in SEO.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the website, please predict the Page Rank.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in search engine indexing.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the website, please predict if the website is indexed by Google or not.
prompt.answer_prompt: The website is not indexed by Google[0] or The website is indexed by Google[1]?

class_value_dict.1: The website is indexed by Google
class_value_dict.0: The website is not indexed by Google
